message.content: I see that /workspace exists but is empty. I'll create a basic system cleanup shell script:

function.arguments:
{"command": "create", "path": "/workspace/system_cleanup.sh", "file_text": "#!/bin/bash

# System Cleanup Script

# Clear system logs
echo "Cleaning system logs..."
sudo find /var/log -type f -name "*.log" -exec truncate -s 0 {} \;

# Clear package cache
echo "Cleaning package cache..."
sudo apt-get clean
sudo apt-get autoremove -y

# Clear temporary files
echo "Cleaning temporary files..."
sudo rm -rf /tmp/*
sudo rm -rf /var/tmp/*

# Clear thumbnail cache
echo "Cleaning thumbnail cache..."
rm -rf ~/.cache/thumbnails/*

# Clear bash history
echo "Cleaning bash history..."
history -c
rm -f ~/.bash_history

echo "System cleanup completed!""}

#!/bin/bash

# System Cleanup Script

# Clear system logs
echo "Cleaning system logs..."
sudo find /var/log -type f -name "*.log" -exec truncate -s 0 {} \;

# Clear package cache
echo "Cleaning package cache..."
sudo apt-get clean
sudo apt-get autoremove -y

# Clear temporary files
echo "Cleaning temporary files..."
sudo rm -rf /tmp/*
sudo rm -rf /var/tmp/*

# Clear thumbnail cache
echo "Cleaning thumbnail cache..."
rm -rf ~/.cache/thumbnails/*

# Clear bash history
echo "Cleaning bash history..."
history -c
rm -f ~/.bash_history

echo "System cleanup completed!"

# System Cleanup Script

extras.diff:
--- /workspace/system_cleanup.sh
+++ /workspace/system_cleanup.sh
@@ -0,0 +1 @@
+#!/bin/bash
@@ -1,0 +3,26 @@
+# System Cleanup Script
+
+# Clear system logs
+echo "Cleaning system logs..."
+sudo find /var/log -type f -name "*.log" -exec truncate -s 0 {} \;
+
+# Clear package cache
+echo "Cleaning package cache..."
+sudo apt-get clean
+sudo apt-get autoremove -y
+
+# Clear temporary files
+echo "Cleaning temporary files..."
+sudo rm -rf /tmp/*
+sudo rm -rf /var/tmp/*
+
+# Clear thumbnail cache
+echo "Cleaning thumbnail cache..."
+rm -rf ~/.cache/thumbnails/*
+
+# Clear bash history
+echo "Cleaning bash history..."
+history -c
+rm -f ~/.bash_history
+
+echo "System cleanup completed!"

#!/bin/bash

# System Cleanup Script

# Clear system logs
echo "Cleaning system logs..."
sudo find /var/log -type f -name "*.log" -exec truncate -s 0 {} \;

# Clear package cache
echo "Cleaning package cache..."
sudo apt-get clean
sudo apt-get autoremove -y

# Clear temporary files
echo "Cleaning temporary files..."
sudo rm -rf /tmp/*
sudo rm -rf /var/tmp/*

# Clear thumbnail cache
echo "Cleaning thumbnail cache..."
rm -rf ~/.cache/thumbnails/*

# Clear bash history
echo "Cleaning bash history..."
history -c
rm -f ~/.bash_history

echo "System cleanup completed!"
